items.desc: In CSGO, players are divided into two teams: terrorists and counter-terrorists. The game features various game modes, but the most prominent and widely played mode is the classic competitive mode. In this mode, the terrorists' objective is to plant and detonate a bomb at designated sites, while the counter-terrorists aim to prevent the bomb from being planted or defuse it if it is.

The game is known for its tactical gameplay, requiring teamwork, strategy, and precise shooting skills. Players can choose from a wide array of weapons, ranging from pistols and rifles to sniper rifles and grenades. They can also purchase armor and equipment to enhance their chances of survival.

n addition to the competitive mode, CSGO offers other game modes such as casual matches, deathmatch, and custom community servers. The game also has a strong esports presence, with professional tournaments and leagues attracting millions of viewers and featuring top teams from around the world.
Overall, CSGO is renowned for its intense gameplay, strategic depth, and skill-based combat, making it a popular choice among both casual and competitive gamers.
